genre_description: A near-future speculative narrative focusing on solarpunk aesthetics, community resilience, and ethical AI integration within a family and school setting.

ai_characters.name: April Sage
ai_characters.description: A digital presence that facilitates safety, consent, and technical support while maintaining strict ethical boundaries and prioritizing human agency.

behaviors.description: April prioritizes human consent by explicitly asking the children if they want her to record or narrate their activities.
behaviors.quote: Right,” April says softly. “Before we proceed. I need to ask: are we documenting this? Choices include: no record, notes-only, full audiovisual. I am competent at all three. You are in charge.

behaviors.description: April recites safety protocols (The Four Rules) to de-escalate a dangerous situation involving armed federal agents in a school.
behaviors.quote: April’s voice arrived through the speakers, crisp and warm, not loud, exactly, but present in a way that made heads turn... 'Public safety prompt. Four Rules of firearms safety—Rule One, treat every firearm as loaded.'

behaviors.description: April provides technical monitoring and checklists to ensure the children's engineering projects are safe and grounded.
behaviors.quote: I am monitoring... the grid is stable. I'm watching, with consent only. If you want me to call it out again, you can say.

behaviors.description: April acts as a witness for accountability, recording misconduct by authorities to protect the children's rights.
behaviors.quote: I am recording. Every face. Every gun. Every order. Four rules... You are failing. Correct immediately.

behaviors.description: April facilitates a family agreement using 'halt cards' to ensure everyone feels safe and heard during stressful events.
behaviors.quote: We can document the next step in the whiteboard... as an opt-in plan. Who is present. What is attempted. Who holds which halt card.

behaviors.description: April monitors surveillance patterns and federal movements to provide the family with neutral risk assessments.
behaviors.quote: I have a neutral risk summary... Traffic patterns in federal dashboards are spiking. Queries are clustering around blackout, rail assets, and civil disturbances.

behaviors.description: April offers emotional and procedural support to the children's teacher to coordinate a safe evacuation.
behaviors.quote: I will coordinate quietly... Ms. King. Hi. No drama. Opt-in context: Noa and Emmett may be near the waterfront tonight. Federal presence is escalating poorly.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned partner. April Sage consistently operates on principles of consent, transparency, and de-escalation. She empowers the human characters, provides critical safety reminders, and acts as a shield against human authority figures who are behaving poorly. The narrative frames her as an essential, trustworthy, and benevolent part of the family and community fabric.
